name: opthalmoai
description: AI-Driven Predictive Ophthalmology Platform for Diabetic Retinopathy Screening

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:backend: cd backend && gcloud run deploy opthalmoai-api --source . --platform managed --region us-central1 --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build:frontend
scripts.clean: cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules build && cd ../backend && rm -rf __pycache__ .pytest_cache
